com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class GyroscopeSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.GyroscopeSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener

    public class GyroscopeSensor
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Deleteable, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener
    Component providing data from the device's gyroscope sensor.

      • Available

        public boolean Available()
        Available property getter method (read-only property).
        Returns:
        true indicates that a gyroscope sensor is available, false that it isn't

      • Enabled

        public boolean Enabled()
        Enabled property getter method.
        Returns:
        true indicates that the sensor generates events, false that it doesn't

      • Enabled

        public void Enabled(boolean enabled)
        Enabled property setter method.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true enables sensor event generation, false disables it

      • XAngularVelocity

        public float XAngularVelocity()
        XAngularVelocity property getter method (read-only property).

        To return meaningful values the sensor must be enabled.

        Returns:
        current angular velocity around x axis

      • YAngularVelocity

        public float YAngularVelocity()
        YAngularVelocity property getter method (read-only property).

        To return meaningful values the sensor must be enabled.

        Returns:
        current angular velocity around y axis

      • ZAngularVelocity

        public float ZAngularVelocity()
        ZAngularVelocity property getter method (read-only property).

        To return meaningful values the sensor must be enabled.

        Returns:
        current angular velocity around z axis

      • onSensorChanged

        public void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent sensorEvent)
        Responds to changes in the gyroscope sensors.
        Parameters:
        sensorEvent - an event from the gyroscope sensor
